LightningComponentBundle.description: A component that presents the user with radio button choices

property.name: uniqueFieldId
property.label: Unique Field Id
property.description: Field Id - must be unique to this process

property.name: questionFontSize
property.label: Question Label Font Size
property.description: Label Font Size - Small, Medium or Large

property.name: questionHint
property.label: Question Hint Text
property.description: The hint text to show below the label

property.name: requiredQuestion
property.label: Required Question?
property.description: Is a question required to submit the form?

property.name: inlineRadios
property.label: Inline Radio Options?
property.description: Choose to display radios ‘inline’ beside one another (horizontally)

property.name: smallerRadios
property.label: Smaller Radio Options?
property.description: Choose to display radios in smaller size

property.name: radioPicklistField
property.label: Radio Picklist Field
property.description: The API name of a picklist to get the labels and values from in the form of SObjectName.FieldName. If standard objects have been renamed, you must use the original API name, for example, if Account has been renamed as Organisation, use Account.Name.

property.name: radioLabels
property.label: Radio Labels
property.description: A comma separated list of labels for the radios. Not required if using Radio Picklist Field.

property.name: radioValues
property.label: Radio Values
property.description: A comma separated list of values for the radios. Not required if using Radio Picklist Field.

property.name: selectedValue
property.label: Selected Value
property.description: Input: The default value to display, Output: The value selected
